'''Messily-Bitted Key''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained by interacting with an [[Investigation|Investigation spot]] dug up by a freed [[Tepetlisaur Whelp]] in a camp located in [["Flower-Feather Clan"]], [[Natlan]].

This key, [[Smooth-Bitted Key]], and [[Straight-Bitted Key]] can be used to release multiple caged Tepetlisaur Whelps to unlock a [[Remarkable Chest]] that holds the blueprint for [[Rope-Bound Multi-Purpose Barrel]].
